subject: Meeting Tomorrow
body: Hi just a reminder about our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. See you then!
label: legitimate

subject: URGENT: Verify Your Account Now!!!
body: Dear customer your account has been suspended due to unusual activity. Click here to verify your identity immediately or your account will be permanently closed.
label: phishing

subject: Weekly Report
body: Please find attached the weekly report for review.
label: legitimate

subject: Congratulations! You won $1000000
body: Dear winner you have been selected to receive $1000000. Click below to claim your prize now! Limited time offer. Act now!
label: phishing

subject: Invoice for Services
body: Thank you for your business. Please find the invoice attached.
label: legitimate

subject: Your payment has failed
body: Dear user your recent payment has failed. Update your billing information immediately to avoid service interruption.
label: phishing

subject: Project Update
body: The project is on track. Next milestone is scheduled for next week.
label: legitimate

subject: Confirm your identity - URGENT
body: DEAR CUSTOMER we have detected suspicious activity. Verify your account now or it will be suspended. Your social security and credit card need confirmation.
label: phishing

subject: Lunch today?
body: Hey want to grab lunch today around noon?
label: legitimate

subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Suspended Account
body: Your account will be closed unless you verify immediately. Click here now.
label: phishing

subject: Newsletter - Monthly Updates
body: Check out our latest articles and updates from this month.
label: legitimate

subject: You have inherited $5 million
body: Dear sir/madam you have been named as beneficiary of a $5 million inheritance. Contact us immediately to claim your funds.
label: phishing

subject: Conference Registration Confirmed
body: Your registration for the annual conference has been confirmed.
label: legitimate

subject: Your Netflix subscription has expired
body: Your Netflix account has been suspended. Update your credit card information now to avoid losing access.
label: phishing

subject: Order Shipped
body: Your order has been shipped and will arrive in 3-5 business days.
label: legitimate

subject: IRS TAX REFUND - CLAIM NOW
body: You are eligible for a tax refund of $3500. Click here to claim now before it expires.
label: phishing

subject: Team Building Event
body: Join us for a team building event next Friday at the park.
label: legitimate

subject: Security Alert: Unusual Sign-In Activity
body: We detected unusual activity on your account. Verify your identity immediately or your account will be locked permanently.
label: phishing

subject: Thank You
body: Thank you for your recent purchase. We appreciate your business.
label: legitimate

subject: Free iPhone 15 - Limited Offer!
body: Congratulations! You have been selected to receive a FREE iPhone 15. Click here to claim before offer expires.
label: phishing
